sentence: Next on the agenda was Ohio, which Nir believes Democrats are unlikely to flip despite having a solid candidate in Congressman Tim Ryan.
title: David Nir on Michelangelo Signorile: 2022 elections, flipping the Senate, and the Trump factor

sentence: Rep. Tim Ryan, who has spoken to this problem and unsuccessfully challenged Nancy Pelosi for the House speakership, has the state party's endorsement.
author: Domenico Montanaro
title: The top 10 Senate seats that are most likely to flip to the other party

sentence: Ohio Democratic Rep. Tim Ryan, the favorite for the Senate nomination, raised $4.1 million and has $6.5 million on hand.
author: Mary Ellen McIntire
title: Senate Democrats raise money furiously to defend majority
